channel.title: Spring Boot on Field Manual
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Boot on Field Manual

item.title: Spring
item.description: Spring Framework # What? Why would you use it? # It is a dependency injection framework that helps you simplify your code. Helps you write scalable code. Baked in with best practices so you can focus on the business problem. It encourages you to use interfaces and helps minimize configuration code. That should make your app more flexible to different implementations and make it easier to test. It’s popular as it encourages developers to write POJOs rather than Enterprise Java Beans and stuff.
